mapper.select: select pc.pc_idx, pc.pc_content, pc.pc_writer, pc.pd_idx, pc.pc_date, pc.pc_file, pc.cm_music, up.profile_img from partner_content pc, user_profile up where pd_idx = #{pdIdx} and deleted_yn = 'N' and pc.pc_writer = user_id
select pc_idx, pc_content, pc_writer, pc_file, pd_idx from partner_content where pc_idx = #{pcIdx} and deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into partner_content (pc_content, pc_writer, pd_idx, pc_file, pc_date, cm_music ) values (#{pcContent}, #{pcWriter}, #{pdIdx}, #{pcFile}, now(), #{cmMusic})
mapper.delete: update partner_content set deleted_yn = 'Y' where pc_idx = #{pcIdx}
mapper.select: select pl.pl_idx, pl.user_id1, pl.user_id2, pl.pl_money, pl.pl_date, up.profile_img from pay_list pl, user_profile up where ((user_id1=#{userId1} and user_id2 =#{userId2}) or (user_id2=#{userId1} and user_id1=#{userId2})) and pl.user_id1 = up.user_id order by pl_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into partner_detail (user_id1, user_id2, progress) values (#{userId1}, #{userId2}, #{progress})
mapper.select: select pdc.pdc_comment, pdc.user_id, pdc.pdc_idx, up.profile_img, pdc.pc_idx from partner_detail_comment pdc, user_profile up where comment_deleted_yn = 'N' and pc_idx = #{pcIdx} and pdc.user_id = up.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into partner_detail_comment (pdc_comment, user_id, pc_idx) values (#{pdcComment}, #{userId}, #{pcIdx})
mapper.delete: update partner_detail_comment set comment_deleted_yn = 'Y' where pdc_idx = #{pdcIdx}
mapper.select: select max(user_profile_idx) from user_profile where user_id = #{userId}
